comment: Browser chooser that routes URLs to different browsers based on user-defined rules

org.freedesktop.Flatpak.reason: Required to launch Flatpak browsers and run xdg-settings on the host to manage default browser settings

--filesystem=host:ro.reason: Browser discovery requires reading .desktop files from /usr/share/applications (native apps), /var/lib/flatpak (system Flatpak), and /var/lib/snapd (Snap). Individual path permissions trigger linter warnings and /usr is reserved by Flatpak, making host:ro the only viable option for comprehensive browser discovery

--filesystem=xdg-data/flatpak:ro.reason: Access to user Flatpak browser exports

--filesystem=/var/lib/flatpak:ro.reason: Access to system-wide Flatpak browser exports

--filesystem=/var/lib/snapd:ro.reason: Access to Snap browsers. Many users install browsers via Snap (Firefox, Chrome, Chromium, Brave, etc.)
